channel.title: blog-publishing system on Logotyp.us
channel.description: Recent content in blog-publishing system on Logotyp.us

item.turbo:content:
<! [CDATA[
 WordPress.com Logo
WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system, referred to within WordPress as Themes. WordPress was originally created as a blog-publishing system but has evolved to support other web content types including more traditional mailing lists and forums, media galleries, membership sites, learning management systems and online stores. WordPress is used by more than 40.
You can download theWordPresslogo on full-version of the page.
]] >
item.title: WordPress
item.description: WordPress is a free and open-source content management system written in PHP and paired with a MySQL or MariaDB database. Features include a plugin architecture and a template system, referred to within WordPress as Themes. WordPress was originally created as a blog-publishing system but has evolved to support other web content types including more traditional mailing lists and forums, media galleries, membership sites, learning management systems and online stores. WordPress is used by more than 40.
